001
002package io.vrap.rmf.base.client;
003
004import java.net.URI;
005import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
006
007import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.http.HandlerStack;
008
009/**
010 * Interface for an HTTP client accessing the API and mapping to a known output type
011 */
012public interface ApiHttpClient extends AutoCloseable, VrapHttpClient {
013    public String CLOSED_MESSAGE = "Client is already closed.";
014
015    public <O> CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<O>> execute(final ApiHttpRequest request, final Class<O> outputType);
016
017    public <O> CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<O>> execute(final ClientRequestCommand<O> method);
018
019    public ResponseSerializer getSerializerService();
020
021    public static ApiHttpClient of(final String baseUri, final HandlerStack stack) {
022        return of(URI.create(baseUri), stack, ResponseSerializer.of());
023    }
024
025    public static ApiHttpClient of(final URI baseUri, final HandlerStack stack) {
026        return of(baseUri, stack, ResponseSerializer.of());
027    }
028
029    public static ApiHttpClient of(final String baseUri, final HandlerStack stack,
030            final ResponseSerializer serializer) {
031        return of(URI.create(baseUri), stack, serializer);
032    }
033
034    public static ApiHttpClient of(final URI baseUri, final HandlerStack stack, final ResponseSerializer serializer) {
035        return new ApiHttpClientImpl(baseUri, stack, serializer);
036    }
037}
